mapper.select:
select t1.id , t1.str_id , (select t.class_name from STRUCTURE_MANAGE t where t.id = t1.str_id ) as strName, t1.std_id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 from major_manage t1
and t1.ID like '%'||#{bean.id}||'%'
and t1.STR_ID like '%'||#{bean.strId}||'%'
and t1.STD_ID like '%'||#{bean.stdId}||'%'
and t1.CREATED_BY like '%'||#{bean.createdBy}||'%'
and t1.CREATION_DATE like '%'||#{bean.creationDate}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdateDate}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdateIp}||'%'
and t1.VERSION like '%'||#{bean.version}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like '%'||#{bean.attribute01}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like '%'||#{bean.attribute02}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like '%'||#{bean.attribute03}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like '%'||#{bean.attribute04}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_05 like '%'||#{bean.attribute05}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_06 like '%'||#{bean.attribute06}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_07 like '%'||#{bean.attribute07}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like '%'||#{bean.attribute08}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like '%'||#{bean.attribute09}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like '%'||#{bean.attribute10}||'%'
and ${sfnConditions.sql}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select t1.id , t1.str_id , t1.std_id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 from major_manage t1 where t1.id = #{id}

select t1.id , t1.str_id , t1.std_id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 from major_manage t1 where t1.std_id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into major_manage
id,
str_id,
std_id,
created_by,
creation_date,
last_updated_by,
last_update_date,
last_update_ip,
version,
attribute_01,
attribute_02,
attribute_03,
attribute_04,
attribute_05,
attribute_06,
attribute_07,
attribute_08,
attribute_09,
attribute_10,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{strId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{creationDate},
#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lastUpdateDate},
#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{attribute01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{attribute02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{attribute03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{attribute04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{attribute05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{attribute06,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{attribute07,jdbcType=DATE},
#{attribute08,jdbcType=DATE},
#{attribute09,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{attribute10,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update major_manage t1
t1.id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.str_id =#{strId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.std_id =#{stdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.created_by =#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.creation_date =#{creationDate},
t1.last_updated_by =#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.last_update_date =#{lastUpdateDate},
t1.last_update_ip =#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.version =t1.version+1,
t1.attribute_01 =#{attribute01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_02 =#{attribute02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_03 =#{attribute03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_04 =#{attribute04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_05 =#{attribute05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_06 =#{attribute06,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_07 =#{attribute07,jdbcType=DATE},
t1.attribute_08 =#{attribute08,jdbcType=DATE},
t1.attribute_09 =#{attribute09,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.attribute_10 =#{attribute10,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where t1.id = #{id} and t1.version =#{version}

update major_manage t1 set t1.id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.str_id =#{strId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.std_id =#{stdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.created_by =#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.creation_date =#{creationDate}, t1.last_updated_by =#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.last_update_date =#{lastUpdateDate}, t1.last_update_ip =#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.version =t1.version+1, t1.attribute_01 =#{attribute01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_02 =#{attribute02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_03 =#{attribute03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_04 =#{attribute04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_05 =#{attribute05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_06 =#{attribute06,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_07 =#{attribute07,jdbcType=DATE}, t1.attribute_08 =#{attribute08,jdbcType=DATE}, t1.attribute_09 =#{attribute09,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.attribute_10 =#{attribute10,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, where t1.id = #{id} and t1.version =#{version}
mapper.delete: delete from major_manage t1 where t1.t1.str_id=#{id}
mapper.select: select t.id from major_manage t where t.std_id=#{id} and t.str_id=#{strId}

select m.std_id as std_id from major_manage m where m.id = (select t.maj_id from INSTITUTE_CENSOR_MANAGE t where t.duty_user_id = #{userId} and t.str_id = #{strId}) union all select f.workshop_id as std_id from factory_complex f where f.id = (select fc.fc_id from factory_censor_manage fc where fc.duty_user_id = #{userId} and fc.str_id = #{strId})
